title: SAFEHITCH - PT199 Gas Leak Detector, Natural Gas Detector with Audible & Visual Alarm, Portable Gas Sniffer to Detect Combustible Gas Leaks Such as Methane, Propane for Home Use (Includes 2 Batteries)
features: Reliable Gas Detection - Accurately detects a wide range of combustible gases, including methane, propane, and natural gas, ensuring safety in your home.
Audible & Visual Alarms - Features both sound and light alarms to alert you immediately to the presence of a gas leak, providing extra peace of mind.
Portable & Easy to Use - Compact and lightweight design allows for easy handling and operation, perfect for home, RV, or workshop use.
Battery Included - Comes with 2 AA batteries, so your gas detector is ready to use straight out of the box with no additional purchase needed.
Durable & Long-lasting - Built to withstand regular use, ensuring reliable performance whenever you need it most.
description: The SafeHitch PT199 Gas Leak Detector is an essential tool for any household, designed to detect harmful gas leaks with ease and accuracy. Equipped with both audible and visual alarms, this portable gas sniffer quickly locates combustible gas leak sources such as methane, propane, and natural gas, ensuring your home and family stay safe. The device is user-friendly and compact, making it convenient for regular safety checks in your home, RV, or workshop. With its reliable performance and easy operation, the SafeHitch PT199 is your go-to solution for gas leak detection. Includes 2 AA batteries, so you can start protecting your home right out of the box.
